longBusinessSummary.0: Aster DM Healthcare Limited operates as a healthcare company in India and internationally. The company operates through Hospitals, Clinics, Retail Pharmacies, and Other segments. It provides primary, secondary, tertiary, and quaternary healthcare services through 29 hospitals, 121 clinics, 421 retail pharmacies, 17 laboratories, and 109 patient experience centers under the Aster, Medcare, and Access brands. In addition, it offers healthcare retailing, diagnostic laboratories, digital health, and medical education services. Aster DM Healthcare Limited, through its subsidiary, Active Holdings Limited, has an agreement with GD Assist Limited for establishing and operating pharmacies in Bangladesh. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.
